1.name: Modern Times
1.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

2.name: After the Thin Man
2.description: Nick investigates the case of a missing man and later a murder that is connected to Nora's family.

3.name: The Ex-Mrs. Bradford
3.description: A wealthy mystery writer uses her doctor ex-husband's non-payment of alimony to coerce him into a reconciliation.

4.name: Flash Gordon
4.description: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Alexis Zarkov visit the planet Mongo to thwart the evil schemes of Emperor Ming the Merciless, who has set his planet on a collision course with Earth.

5.name: Camille
5.description: A Parisian courtesan must choose between the young man who loves her and the callous baron who wants her, even as her own health begins to fail.

6.name: My Man Godfrey
6.description: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler...but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

7.name: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
7.description: A simple, small town man inherits a massive fortune, making him the target for scammers and publicity-seekers. Overwhelmed by the turn his life has taken, and awoken to another use for his new-found fortune, he makes a momentous decision.

8.name: The Plainsman
8.description: Wild Bill Hickok attempts to stop an Indian uprising that was started by white gun-runners.

9.name: Things to Come
9.description: The story of a century: a decades-long second World War leaves plague and anarchy, then a rational state rebuilds civilization and attempts space travel.

10.name: Reefer Madness
10.description: Cautionary tale features a fictionalized take on the use of marijuana. A trio of drug dealers lead innocent teenagers to become addicted to "reefer" cigarettes by holding wild parties with jazz music.

11.name: Swing Time
11.description: A performer and gambler travels to New York City to raise the $25,000 he needs to marry his fiancée, only to become entangled with a beautiful aspiring dancer.

12.name: Sabotage
12.description: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.

13.name: The Petrified Forest
13.description: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

14.name: Secret Agent
14.description: After three British Agents are assigned to assassinate a mysterious German spy during World War I, two of them become ambivalent when their duty to the mission conflicts with their consciences.

15.name: Tarzan Escapes
15.description: An expedition seeking to bring Jane back to civilization, and Tarzan into captivity, gets more than it's bargained for.

16.name: Fury
16.description: When a wrongly accused prisoner barely survives a lynch mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

17.name: The Great Ziegfeld
17.description: The ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld Jr., famed producer of extravagant stage revues, are portrayed.

18.name: The Charge of the Light Brigade
18.description: A major countermands orders and attacks to avenge a previous massacre of men, women, and children.

19.name: Dracula's Daughter
19.description: Hungarian countess Marya Zaleska seeks the aid of a noted psychiatrist, hoping to free herself of a mysterious evil influence.

20.name: Follow the Fleet
20.description: A Navy sailor tries to rekindle a romance with the woman he loves while on liberty in San Francisco.

21.name: Poor Little Rich Girl
21.description: The daughter of a wealthy businessman becomes lost in the city while traveling to a new school, and is taken in by a pair of down-on-their-luck performers.

22.name: San Francisco
22.description: A Barbary Coast saloonkeeper and a Nob Hill impresario are rivals for the affections of a beautiful singer, both personally and professionally in 1906 San Francisco.

23.name: Libeled Lady
23.description: A newspaper man, his ignored fiancée, and his former employee, a down on his luck reporter, hatch an elaborate scheme to turn a false news story into the truth in order to prevent a high-society woman from suing for libel.

24.name: The Devil-Doll
24.description: An escaped convict uses miniaturized humans to wreak vengeance on those that framed him.

25.name: Heart of the West
25.description: Ranch owner Sally Jordan is engaged in a fence war with rancher Big John Trumbull. Hoppy and Johnny, along with trusty sidekick Windy, side with Sally Jordan. They control a huge cattle stampede by using dynamite.

26.name: Anthony Adverse
26.description: In 18th-century Italy, an orphan's debt to the man who raised him threatens to separate him forever from the woman he loves.

27.name: Pennies from Heaven
27.description: Larry Poole, in prison on a false charge, promise an inmate that when he gets out he will look up and help out a family. The family turns out to be a young girl, Patsy Smith, and her ...                See full summary »

28.name: Romeo and Juliet
28.description: Young love is poisoned by a generations long feud between two noble families.

29.name: The Crime of Monsieur Lange
29.description: A man and a woman arrive in a cafe-hotel near the Belgian frontier. The customers recognize the man from the police description. His name is Amedee Lange, and he murdered Batala in Paris. ...                See full summary »

30.name: The Texas Rangers
30.description: Two down-on-their-luck former outlaws volunteer to be Texas Rangers and find themselves assigned to bring in an old friend, now a notorious outlaw.

31.name: Show Boat
31.description: Despite her mother's objections, the naive young daughter of a show boat captain is thrust into the limelight as the company's new leading lady.

32.name: The Case of the Black Cat
32.description: An bedridden eccentric millionaire, anticipating his own murder, hires Mason to help him rewrite his will, and the lawyer ends up defending the caretaker's cat.

33.name: Crown v. Stevens
33.description: When an ex-dancer marries a man for his money she is suprised find he is a real skinflint. She owes a lot of money to a loan-shark who is after her. However, her husband does carry a lot of...                See full summary »

34.name: Anything Goes
34.description: A young man falls in love with a beautiful blonde. When he sees her being forced onto a luxury liner, he decides to follow and rescue her. However, he discovers that she is an English ...                See full summary »

35.name: The Garden of Allah
35.description: The star-crossed desert romance of a cloistered woman and a renegade monk.

36.name: Wife vs. Secretary
36.description: The wife of a publishing executive mistakenly believes that her husband's relationship with his attractive secretary is more than professional.

37.name: Mary of Scotland
37.description: The recently widowed Mary Stuart returns to Scotland to reclaim her throne but is opposed by her half-brother and her own Scottish lords.

38.name: Small Town Girl
38.description: Kay is a girl living in a small rural town whose life is just too dull and repetitious to bear. One night, she meets young, handsome, and rich Bob Dakin, who asks her for directions while ...                See full summary »

39.name: The Walking Dead
39.description: After hapless pianist and ex-con John Elman is framed for murder, he is resurrected by a scientist after his execution.

40.name: Born to Dance
40.description: Sailor Ted meets at the Lonely Hearts Club of his friend Gunny's wife, Jenny, a girl, Nora Paige, and falls in love. Nora wants to become a dancer on Broadway. Ted rescues the Pekinese of ...                See full summary »

41.name: These Three
41.description: Two school teachers and the man they both love face ruin when a malicious student cooks up a lie.

42.name: Dodsworth
42.description: A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a long-planned European vacation only to find that they want very different things from life.

43.name: The Invisible Ray
43.description: A scientist becomes murderous after discovering, and being exposed to the radiation of, a powerful new element called Radium X.

44.name: Our Relations
44.description: Two pairs of long-lost twin brothers experience high jinks involving a valuable ring, cases of mistaken identity, and gangsters.

45.name: Rose-Marie
45.description: An incognito opera singer falls for a policeman who has been assigned to track down her fugitive brother.

46.name: Desire
46.description: An automotive engineer bound for a holiday in Spain meets a sultry jewel thief.

47.name: Intermezzo
47.description: The world famous violinist Holger Brandt comes back to his family after a tour. He and his wife have been married for many years, but their love has gone. Their young daughter gets a new ...                See full summary »

48.name: The Story of Louis Pasteur
48.description: The biography of the pioneering French microbiologist who helped revolutionize agriculture and medicine.

49.name: Hopalong Cassidy Returns
49.description: A crusading newspaper editor recruits his old friend Hoppy to take the job of marshal in a town rife with vice and murder directed at helpless miners.

50.name: Theodora Goes Wild
50.description: The author of a controversially racy best-selling book tries to hide her celebrity status from her provincial small-town neighbors, who'd be scandalized if they knew.
